page.title: 05PLAYGROUND GAMES 3
page.content: {Stag}is an out door game you can play in a large or small area. You need about 10 or more people to play and 2 people,a boy and a girl, are on to start the game. These people run around trying to tig other people. You do this by touching their back or arm and saying 'STAG!'. When everybody is caught the game is over. The first two people caught are on at the start of the next game. J. Sullivan {Marbles}is a seasonal game played by 2 people each with a marble. The object of the game is to win your opponents marble by hitting it. You take it in turns to take shots. We play among the rocks to stop other people from kicking them. There are many types and sizes of marbles. They have different colours and patterns. Big marbles are called Pharoahs or Kings. The rarest are plain, coloured marbles. J.Smith
